column4: does anyone else have the problem where they don't see what people are typing unless they type your name first?
which IRC app are you using?
even... xchat
odd - try quiting & restarting xchat
why?
because restarting often cures odd behaviours :P
i don't get you
exit XChat, restart it, and see if it keeps doing the odd behaviour, that's all
what odd behaviour?
does anyone else have the problem where they don't see what people are typing unless they type your name first? <-- that one
if you've pm'd the bot, "<new thing> is <blather>"
yeah, it remembers but doesn't spit anything back
what've you added?
i added Lynx
yeah, http://ubuntu.cc.com.au/ has it listed, but it won't display
is that the web based version?
ahh nice
the bot's acting rather odd...
ahh ok, probably needs a restart
no idea. You could /memo cafeugo, it's his bot
see the URL I just posted for frank__ ^^^
actually, nevermind, usplash isn't covered there
install Baobab - it's a little Nautilus plugin app - if you want a graphical way of looking at directory sizes
re: baobab, nah i'm a cli man myself.. thanks tho
